azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Available Memory Bytes'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "Memory" and Name == "AvailableMB" | extend TotalMemory = toreal(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB"]) | extend AvailableMemoryPercentage = (toreal(Val) / TotalMemory) * 100.0 | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(AvailableMemoryPercentage) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'CPU Credits Consumed'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'CPU Credits Remaining'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Bandwidth Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk"and Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk !in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk IOPS Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Max Burst IOPS'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Queue Depth'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" and Name == "ReadLatencyMs" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk !in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Read Operations/Sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Write Bytes/sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" and Name == "WriteLatencyMs" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk !in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated,15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Data Disk Write Operations/Sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Disk Read Bytes'
| summarize metric = avg(Total) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Disk Read Operations/Sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Disk Write Bytes'
| summarize metric = avg(Total) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Disk Write Operations/Sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

Heartbeat | summarize TimeGenerated=max(TimeGenerated) by Computer, _ResourceId | extend Duration = datetime_diff('minute',now(),TimeGenerated) | summarize AggregatedValue = min(Duration) by Computer, bin(TimeGenerated,5m), _ResourceId

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Inbound Flows'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Network In Total'
| summarize metric = avg(Total) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Network Out Total'
| summarize metric = avg(Total) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "Network" and Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" | extend NetworkInterface=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/networkDeviceId"]) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId, NetworkInterface

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "Network" and Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond" | extend NetworkInterface=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/networkDeviceId"]) | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId, NetworkInterface

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk Bandwidth Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" and Name == "FreeSpacePercentage" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk IOPS Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk Max Burst IOPS'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk Queue Depth'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" and Name == "ReadLatencyMs" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk Write Bytes/sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics| where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk" and Name == "WriteLatencyMs" | extend Disk=tostring(todynamic(Tags)["vm.azm.ms/mountId"]) | where Disk in ('C:','/') | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId, Disk

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'OS Disk Write Operations/Sec'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Outbound Flows'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'Percentage CPU'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

InsightsMetrics | where Origin == "vm.azm.ms" | where Namespace == "Processor" and Name == "UtilizationPercentage" | summarize AggregatedValue = avg(Val) by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m), Computer, _ResourceId

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'VM Cached Bandwidth Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'VM Cached IOPS Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'VM Uncached Bandwidth Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'VM Uncached IOPS Consumed Percentage'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource

AzureMetrics
| where _ResourceId has 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where MetricName has 'VmAvailabilityMetric'
| summarize metric = avg(Average) by _ResourceId, Resource
